objects.text:
• Durable Design
• Spacious Interior
• Gold Hardware
• Faux Leather

product_details.description: ALDO womens Durable handbag This spaciously stylish tote bag boasts ample storage space and shoulder strap for extra utility Made of synthetic materials 1 compartment: stylish and functional to store your cell phone, wallet, or any other essential you need near by Medium: the perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H (28cm x 10.5cm x 32cm) Fabric type - Faux Leather ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Synthetic ** Country of Origin - Cambodia **

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a clean, modern layout with a minimalist aesthetic. The top portion showcases the brand prominently using the "brand_name" layer, followed by the product name in large, stylized typography via the "heading" text layer. A concise description of product features is listed on the left using the "description" layer. A centrally-aligned product image ("product_image") adds focus, while pricing is emphasized in bold using the "price" text layer. A rectangular call-to-action button ("cta_button") with centered text ("cta") invites the viewer to shop. The background incorporates soft geometric design elements and a warm, neutral tone.

**Color Palette:**
- Cream Beige: #F5EFE6  
- Soft Tan: #D0B49F  
- Rich Brown: #6C3928  
- Walnut: #886347  
- Cocoa: #4A3728  
- Gold Accent Lines: #C69C6D  
- Off-White (Text/Button): #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image features a sophisticated ALDO handbag in a warm camel brown shade (#A47149), forming the dominant base color. This neutral tone gives a rich and elegant aesthetic while maintaining versatility in pairing with other hues. Gold hardware accents (#D4AF37) on the bag, including the lock, chain, and logo, create an upscale look and provide visual highlights against the textured brown surface. The overall blend is seamless yet defined, with the metallic gold appearing crisp and bold. To create an advertisement banner, a palette with complementary tones like soft beige (#F5EBDD), ivory (#FFFFFF), and darker brown (#6B4E34) will enhance cohesion while keeping focus on the product’s luxury appeal.
